001package gust.backend;
002
003import gust.backend.runtime.Logging;
004import io.micronaut.http.HttpRequest;
005import io.micronaut.http.context.ServerRequestContext;
006import io.micronaut.runtime.http.scope.RequestScope;
007import io.micronaut.views.soy.SoyNamingMapProvider;
008import org.slf4j.Logger;
009import tools.elide.page.Context;
010
011import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
012import javax.annotation.Nullable;
013import java.io.Closeable;
014import java.util.Map;
015import java.util.Optional;
016import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
017import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListMap;
018
019
020/**
021 * Manages the process of filling out {@link PageContext} objects before they are sealed, and delivered to Closure/Soy
022 * to be reduced and rendered into content.
023 *
024 * <p>This object may be used from controllers via dependency injection, or used via the base controller classes provided
025 * as part of the framework.</p>
026 */
027@RequestScope
028@SuppressWarnings("unused")
029public class PageContextManager implements Closeable, AutoCloseable, PageRender {
030  private static final Logger LOG = Logging.logger(PageContextManager.class);
031
032  /** Page context builder. */
033  private final @Nonnull Context.Builder context;
034
035  /** HTTP request bound to this flow. */
036  private final @Nonnull HttpRequest request;
037
038  /** Main properties to apply during Soy render. */
039  private final @Nonnull ConcurrentMap<String, Object> props;
040
041  /** Additional injected values to apply during Soy render. */
042  private final @Nonnull ConcurrentMap<String, Object> injected;
043
044  /** Naming map provider to apply during the Soy render flow. */
045  private @Nonnull Optional<SoyNamingMapProvider> namingMapProvider;
046
047  /** Built context: assembled when we "close" the page context manager. */
048  private @Nullable PageContext builtContext = null;
049
050  /** Whether we have closed context building or not. */
051  private boolean closed = false;
052
053  /**
054   * Constructor for page context.
055   *
056   * @param namingMapProvider Style renaming map provider.
057   * @throws IllegalStateException If an attempt is made to construct context outside of a server-side HTTP flow.
058   */
059  PageContextManager(@Nonnull Optional<SoyNamingMapProvider> namingMapProvider) {
060    if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) LOG.debug("Initializing `PageContextManager`.");
061    //noinspection SimplifyOptionalCallChains
062    if (!ServerRequestContext.currentRequest().isPresent())
063      throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot construct `PageContext` outside of a server-side HTTP flow.");
064    this.request = ServerRequestContext.currentRequest().get();
065    this.context = Context.newBuilder();
066    this.props = new ConcurrentSkipListMap<>();
067    this.injected = new ConcurrentSkipListMap<>();
068    this.namingMapProvider = namingMapProvider;
069  }
070
071  /** @return The current page context builder. */
072  @Nonnull public Context.Builder getContext() {
073    if (this.closed)
074      throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot access mutable context after closing page manager state.");
075    return context;
076  }
077
078  /** @return Built context. After calling this method the first time, context may no longer be mutated. */
079  @Nonnull public PageContext render() {
080    if (this.closed) {
081      assert this.builtContext != null;
082    } else {
083      this.closed = true;
084      this.builtContext = PageContext.fromProto(
085        this.context.build(),
086        this.props,
087        this.injected,
088        this.namingMapProvider.orElse(null));
089      if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
090        LOG.debug(String.format("Exported page context with: %s props, %s injecteds, and proto follows \n%s",
091          this.props.size(),
092          this.injected.size(),
093          this.builtContext.getPageContext()));
094      }
095    }
096    return this.builtContext;
097  }
098
099  // -- Page-level Interface (Context) -- //
100
101  /**
102   * Set the page title for the current render flow. If the app makes use of the framework's built-in page frame, the
103   * title will automatically be used.
104   *
105   * @param title Title to set for the current page. Do not pass `null`.
106   * @return Current page context manager (for call chain-ability).
107   * @throws IllegalArgumentException If `null` is passed for the title.
108   */
109  public @Nonnull PageContextManager title(@Nonnull String title) {
110    //noinspection ConstantConditions
111    if (title == null) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot pass `null` for page title.");
112    this.context.getMetaBuilder().setTitle(title);
113    return this;
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Include the specified JavaScript resource in the rendered page, according to enclosed settings (i.e. respecting
118   * <pre>defer</pre>, <pre>async</pre>, and other attributes). If the script asset has an ID, it will <b>not</b> be
119   * passed through ID rewriting before being rendered.
120   *
121   * <p><b>Behavior:</b> Script assets included in this manner are always loaded in the document head, so be judicious
122   * with <pre>defer</pre> if you are loading a significant amount of JavaScript. There are no default script assets.
123   * Scripts are emitted in the order in which they are attached to the page context (i.e. via this method).</p>
124   *
125   * @param script Script asset to load in the rendered page output. Do not pass `null`.
126   * @return Current page context manager (for call chain-ability).
127   * @throws IllegalArgumentException If `null` is passed for the script.
128   */
129  public @Nonnull PageContextManager script(@Nonnull Context.Scripts.JavaScript.Builder script) {
130    //noinspection ConstantConditions
131    if (script == null) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot pass `null` for script.");
132    this.context.getScriptsBuilder().addLink(script);
133    return this;
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Include the specified CSS stylesheet resource in the rendered page, according to the enclosed settings (i.e.
138   * respecting properties like <pre>media</pre>). If the stylesheet has an ID, it will <b>not</b> be passed through ID
139   * rewriting before being rendered.
140   *
141   * <p>Stylesheets included in this manner are always loaded in the head, via a link tag. If you want to defer loading
142   * of styles, you'll have to do so from JS. Stylesheet links are emitted in the order in which they are attached to
143   * the page context (i.e. via this method).</p>
144   *
145   * @param stylesheet Stylesheet asset to load in the rendered page output. Do not pass `null`.
146   * @return Current page context manager (for call chain-ability).
147   * @throws IllegalArgumentException If `null` is passed for the stylesheet.
148   */
149  public @Nonnull PageContextManager stylesheet(@Nonnull Context.Styles.Stylesheet.Builder stylesheet) {
150    //noinspection ConstantConditions
151    if (stylesheet == null) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot pass `null` for stylesheet.");
152    this.context.getStylesBuilder().addLink(stylesheet);
153    return this;
154  }
155
156  // -- Map-like Interface (Props) -- //
157
158  /**
159   * Install a regular context value, at the named key provided. This will make the value available in any bound Soy
160   * render flow via a <pre>@param</pre> declaration on the subject template to be rendered.
161   *
162   * @param key Key at which to make this available as a param.
163   * @param value Value to provide for the parameter.
164   * @return Current page context manager (for call chain-ability).
165   * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the provided <pre>key</pre> is <pre>null</pre>, or a disallowed value, like
166   *         <pre>context</pre> (which cannot be overridden).
167   */
168  public @Nonnull PageContextManager put(@Nonnull String key, @Nonnull Object value) {
169    //noinspection ConstantConditions
170    if (key == null)
171      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Must provide a key to put a Soy context property. Got `null` for key.");
172    this.props.put(key, value);
173    return this;
174  }
175
176  /**
177   * Safely retrieve a value from the current render context properties. If no property is found at the provided key,
178   * an empty {@link Optional} is returned. Otherwise, an {@link Optional} is returned wrapping whatever value was
179   * found.
180   *
181   * @param key Key at which to retrieve the desired render context property.
182   * @return Optional-wrapped context property value.
183   */
184  public @Nonnull Optional<Object> get(@Nonnull String key) {
185    return this.get(key, false);
186  }
187
188  /**
189   * Safely retrieve a value from either the current render context properties, or the current injected values. If no
190   * value is found in whatever context we're looking in, an empty {@link Optional} is returned. Otherwise, an
191   * {@link Optional} is returned wrapping whatever value was found.
192   *
193   * @param key Key at which to retrieve the desired render property or injected value.
194   * @param injected Whether to look in the injected values, or regular property values.
195   * @return Empty optional if nothing was found, otherwise, the found value wrapped in an optional.
196   */
197  public @Nonnull Optional<Object> get(@Nonnull String key, boolean injected) {
198    final ConcurrentMap<String, Object> base = injected ? this.injected : this.props;
199    if (base.containsKey(key))
200      return Optional.of(base.get(key));
201    return Optional.empty();
202  }
203
204  /**
205   * Install an injected context value, at the named key provided. This will make the value available in any bound Soy
206   * render flow via the <pre>@inject</pre> declaration, on any template in the render flow.
207   *
208   * @param key Key at which to make this available as an injected value.
209   * @param value Value to provide for the parameter.
210   * @return Current page context manager (for call chain-ability).
211   * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the provided <pre>key</pre> is <pre>null</pre>, or a disallowed value, like
212   *         <pre>context</pre> (which cannot be overridden).
213   */
214  public @Nonnull PageContextManager inject(@Nonnull String key, @Nonnull Object value) {
215    //noinspection ConstantConditions
216    if (key == null)
217      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Must provide a key to put a Soy context property. Got `null` for key.");
218    if ("context".equals(key.toLowerCase()))
219      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot use key 'context' for injected property.");
220    this.injected.put(key, value);
221    return this;
222  }
223
224  /**
225   * Install, or uninstall, the request-scoped renaming map provider. This object will be used to lookup style classes
226   * and IDs for render-time rewriting. To disable an existing naming map provider override, simply pass an empty
227   * {@link Optional}.
228   *
229   * <p>If no renaming map provider is set here, but a global one is, and renaming is enabled, the global map will be
230   * used. If a renaming map is set here, but renaming is <i>not</i> enabled, no renaming takes place.</p>
231   *
232   * @param namingMapProvider Renaming map provider to install, or {@link Optional#empty()} to uninstall any existing
233   *                          overriding renaming map provider.
234   * @return Current page context manager (for call chain-ability).
235   */
236  public @Nonnull PageContextManager rewrite(@Nonnull Optional<SoyNamingMapProvider> namingMapProvider) {
237    this.namingMapProvider = namingMapProvider;
238    return this;
239  }
240
241  // -- Interface: HTTP Request -- //
242
243  /**
244   * Return the currently-active HTTP request object, to which the current render/controller flow is bound.
245   *
246   * @return Active HTTP request object.
247   */
248  public @Nonnull HttpRequest getRequest() {
249    return this.request;
250  }
251
252  // -- Interface: Closeable -- //
253
254  /**
255   * Closes this stream and releases any system resources associated with it. If the stream is already closed then
256   * invoking this method has no effect.
257   *
258   * <p>As noted in {@link AutoCloseable#close()}, cases where the close may fail require careful attention. It is
259   * strongly advised to relinquish the underlying resources and to internally <em>mark</em> the {@code Closeable} as
260   * closed, prior to throwing the {@code IOException}.
261   */
262  @Override
263  public void close() {
264    if (!this.closed) {
265      this.render();
266    }
267  }
268
269  // -- Interface: Delegated Context -- //
270
271  /**
272   * Retrieve serializable server-side-rendered page context, which should be assigned to the render flow bound to this
273   * context mediator.
274   *
275   * @return Server-side rendered page context.
276   */
277  @Override
278  public @Nonnull Context getPageContext() {
279    this.close();
280    if (this.builtContext == null) throw new IllegalStateException("Unable to read page context.");
281    return this.builtContext.getPageContext();
282  }
283
284  /**
285   * Retrieve properties which should be made available via regular, declared `@param` statements.
286   *
287   * @return Map of regular template properties.
288   */
289  @Nonnull
290  @Override
291  public Map<String, Object> getProperties() {
292    this.close();
293    if (this.builtContext == null) throw new IllegalStateException("Unable to read page context.");
294    return this.builtContext.getProperties();
295  }
296
297  /**
298   * Retrieve properties and values that should be made available via `@inject`.
299   *
300   * @return Map of injected properties and their values.
301   */
302  @Nonnull
303  @Override
304  public Map<String, Object> getInjectedProperties() {
305    this.close();
306    if (this.builtContext == null) throw new IllegalStateException("Unable to read page context.");
307    return this.builtContext.getInjectedProperties();
308  }
309
310  /**
311   * Specify a Soy renaming map which overrides the globally-installed map, if any. Renaming must still be activated via
312   * config, or manually, for the return value of this method to have any effect.
313   *
314   * @return {@link SoyNamingMapProvider} that should be used for this render routine.
315   */
316  @Nonnull
317  @Override
318  public Optional<SoyNamingMapProvider> overrideNamingMap() {
319    this.close();
320    if (this.builtContext == null) throw new IllegalStateException("Unable to read page context.");
321    return this.builtContext.overrideNamingMap();
322  }
323}
